overview: Midori, a woman with green genitals, and the three men who love her lead a strange and peaceful life together. However, when Midori returns from a trip alone, the balance suddenly begins to unravel, and the drama begins to run toward its tragic conclusion. The dry, stoic tone pervades the entire film, the realistic performances of the four actors, and the frightening tension of the images. The power of this film can be seen in its 140 minutes.
title: Midori Woman
